flawed_nl_solution:
Barney uses 2 clean towels every day, so he uses 2 * 7 = <<2*7=14>>14 towels a week.
He missed one week of laundry, so he would need 2 * 14 = <<2*14=28>>28 towels for 2 weeks.
He owns 18 towels, so he has 28 - 18 = <<28-18=6>>6 less than he needs.
Thus, Barney will not have clean towels on 6 / 2 = <<6/2=3>>3 days.
#### 3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
